creator.description:
A labeling service for @bike.community that provides moderation and verified and non-verified labels for bike enjoyers.

Subscribe and follow the instructions in our pinned post to get yourself a label.

Run by @derek.bike

locales.description: A person who enjoys bikes.
locales.name: Bike Enjoyer

locales.description: Someone who rides bikes for any purpose.
locales.name: Cyclist

locales.description: Someone who enjoys e-bikes in particular.
locales.name: E-Bike Evangelist

locales.description: Someone who enjoys cargo bikes in particular.
locales.name: Cargo Bike Lover

locales.description: Someone who rides a bicycle at a moderate pace, usually in normal street clothes.
locales.name: Fietser

locales.description: A middle aged man in lycra.
locales.name: MAMIL

locales.description: A middle aged woman in lycra.
locales.name: MAWIL

locales.description: Someone who enjoys riding a bike on the road.
locales.name: Roadie

locales.description: Someone who enjoys riding a bike on gravel.
locales.name: Gravel Rider

locales.description: Someone who enjoys riding a bike on single track or even less.
locales.name: MTBer

locales.description: Someone who loves to disappear into the woods on a bike.
locales.name: Forest Rider

locales.description: Someone who lives for the smell of the ocean as they ride by on a bike.
locales.name: Beach Cruiser

locales.description: Someone who can balance while not moving on a bike.
locales.name: Track Stander

locales.description: Someone who can enjoys recumbent bikes in particular.
locales.name: Recumbent Rider

locales.description: Someone who rides regularly to get to work, school or run errands.
locales.name: Bike Commuter

locales.description: Someone who rides a bike every day.
locales.name: Daily Rider

locales.description: Someone who is working to end violence on our streets and make them safer for everyone.
locales.name: Safe Streets

locales.description: Someone who is working to get more people using active travel to improve the health of their communities.
locales.name: Active Travel

locales.description: Someone who organizes or participates in bike busses in their community.
locales.name: Bike Bus

locales.description: Someone who says “what’s over there?” and then uses a bike to find out.
locales.name: Two Wheeled Explorer

locales.description: Someone who rides a bike on roads as if they are driving a car.
locales.name: Vehicular Cyclist

locales.description: Someone who rides bikes and is a member of the clergy.
locales.name: Clergy Who Cycle

locales.description: Someone who rides on either the front seat or the back seat of a tandem bike.
locales.name: Tandem Bike Partner

locales.description: Someone who combines riding bikes with taking photographs to capture beautiful moments.
locales.name: Biking Photographer

locales.description: Someone who enjoys wrenching on a bike as much as they enjoy riding one.
locales.name: Bike Tinkerer

locales.description: Someone who helps bike riders reach their goals by adjusting the fit of their bike.
locales.name: Bike Fitter

locales.description: Someone who enjoys well crafted bike infrastructure.
locales.name: Bike Lane Appreciator

locales.description: Someone who enjoys always having a bike to ride within reach.
locales.name: Bikeshare Subscriber

locales.description: Someone who can not believe a shrimp fried this bike.
locales.name: Bike Shitposter

locales.description: Someone who takes issue with at least one of UCI's rules.
locales.name: UCI Rule Disputer

locales.description: A person or organization engaged in helping people connect over a shared love of bikes.
locales.name: Bike Community Builder

locales.description:
A club for cyclists, either local, generalized or specialized.

This profile has been independently verified. ✅
locales.name: Cycling Club

locales.description:
This is the official account of a biking-related podcast.

This profile has been independently verified. ✅
locales.name: Biking Podcast

locales.description:
Someone who runs a biking-related podcast.

This profile has been independently verified. ✅
locales.name: Biking Podcaster

locales.description:
Someone who is a journalist, photographer or content creator for a biking-related publication.

This profile has been independently verified. ✅
locales.name: Biking Media

locales.description:
This is the official account of a biking publication.

This profile has been independently verified. ✅
locales.name: Biking Publication

locales.description:
This is the official account of a biking related business.

This profile has been independently verified. ✅
locales.name: Bike Business

locales.description:
Someone who repairs and services bikes professionally.

This profile has been independently verified. ✅
locales.name: Bike Mechanic

locales.description:
Someone who creates biking related content of any kind.

This profile has been independently verified. ✅
locales.name: Biking Content Creator

locales.description:
A charitable organization that uses bikes to make positive change.

This profile has been independently verified. ✅
locales.name: Biking Charity

locales.description:
This is the official account of a bike manufacturer.

This profile has been independently verified. ✅
locales.name: Bike Manufacturer

locales.description: ❌ This account appears to be impersonating someone in bike.community.
locales.name: Impersonation

locales.description: This content has been marked unrelated to bike.community's feeds, and may have been included in them by mistake.
locales.name: Unrelated to bike.community

locales.description: This content has been marked unrelated to bike.community's Bikesky feeds, and may have been included in them by mistake.
locales.name: Unrelated to Bikesky

locales.description: This content has been marked unrelated to bike.community's Pro Cycling feeds, and may have been included in them by mistake.
locales.name: Unrelated to Pro Cycling
